software_masters.gui_test

Class GuiTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testfx.api.FxRobot
      • org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationTest
        • software_masters.gui_test.GuiTestBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.testfx.api.FxRobotInterface, org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationFixture

    public abstract class GuiTestBase
extends org.testfx.framework.junit5.ApplicationTest
    Author:
    software masters This class contains methods that are common to all of the gui tests. It is the testing super class.
